content: अभ्यस्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Repeated, frequently practised, exercised; नयनयोरभ्यरतमामीलनं <ls>Amaru. 92</ls>; used or accustomed to; अनभ्यस्तरथचर्याः <ls>U. 5</ls> not accustomed to the use of the chariot; °गुणा च वाणी <ls>Māl. 3. 11.</ls> {@--2@} Learnt, studied; शैशवेऽ भ्यस्तविद्यानां <ls>R. 1. 8</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 89.</ls> {@--3@} (In <ab>Math.</ab>) Multiplied; अयुतं दशकृत्वोऽ भ्यस्तं नियुतमुच्यते <ls>Nir.</ls> {@--4@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Reduplicated. --स्तं Reduplicated base of a root.
अभ्यस्तं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [अस्तमभि] Towards sunset; °गम्-इ, --या to go down or set (as the sun) during or with reference to some act.
